00036 class BDSQuadStepper : public G4MagIntegratorStepper
00037 {
00038 
00039   public:  // with description
00040 
00041     BDSQuadStepper(G4Mag_EqRhs *EqRhs);
00042 
00043     ~BDSQuadStepper();
00044 
00045       void Stepper( const G4double y[],
00046                   const G4double dydx[],
00047                   const G4double h,
00048                   G4double yout[],
00049                   G4double yerr[]  );
00050       // The stepper for the Runge Kutta integration.
00051       // The stepsize is fixed, equal to h.
00052       // Integrates ODE starting values y[0 to 6]
00053       // Outputs yout[] and its estimated error yerr[].
00054 
00055     G4double DistChord()   const;
00056       // Estimate maximum distance of curved solution and chord ... 
00057  
00058      void SetBGrad(G4double aBfield);
00059      G4double GetBGrad();
00060 
00061      void StepperName();
00062 
00063   /*
00064    void DumbStepper( const G4double yInput[],
00065                      G4ThreeVector Bfld,
00066                      G4double hstep,
00067                      G4double yOut[]);
00068 
00069   */
00070   public: // without description
00071   
00072     G4int IntegratorOrder()const { return 2; }
00073 
00074   protected:
00075     //  --- Methods used to implement all the derived classes -----
00076 
00077     void AdvanceHelix( const G4double  yIn[],
00078                        G4ThreeVector Bfld,
00079                        G4double  h,
00080                        G4double  yQuad[]);    // output 
00081       // A first order Step along a quad inside the field.
00082 
00083   private:
00084   
00085     G4ThreeVector yInitial, yMidPoint, yFinal;
00086       // Data stored in order to find the chord.
00087 
00088     G4Mag_EqRhs*  fPtrMagEqOfMot;
00089 
00090     G4double itsBGrad;
00091   //    G4ThreeVector itsInitialPoint, itsFinalPoint, itsMidPoint,itsDistVec;
00092     G4double itsDist;
00093 
00094 };
00095 
00096 inline  void BDSQuadStepper::SetBGrad(G4double aBGrad)
00097 {itsBGrad=aBGrad;
00098 }
00099 inline G4double BDSQuadStepper::GetBGrad()
00100 {return itsBGrad;}

00103 {G4cout<<"BDSQuadStepper"<<G4endl;}
